duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily calendars, schedule and coordinate meetings, case-related correspondence, and general administrative duties.
Track court-imposed deadlines, litigation project deadlines, and coordinate with all stakeholders in the litigation.
Draft pleadings, discovery answers and responses, motions, and other legal filings with the direct supervision of the attorney.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or equivalent (Bachelor's Degree preferred)
